page.title: 11Life Style
page.content: For the project we completed a survey on the life style of the local people. Firstly we interviewed fifty people in the street to find out about the facilities they have in their homes.Our results showed that 96% of the people interviewed have a garden and 70% have a garage.It was surprising that only 63% have central heating but everyone we interviewed has a television.Many people in Louth own a video,50% and a stereo 78%.Very few people own luxury items such as dishwashers 18% and microwaves 26%. Next we interviewed local boutiqes proprietors and hairstylists to discover the fashions of 1985.The popular colours are pastel shades of pink,blue,yellow and green.Designs tend to be loose and baggy with large floral prints.Bobs and short spiky cuts are the current trends. o.
